thread.title: Krystal

author: Krystal
title: Krystal
text: I Am Absolutely More Than Satisfied With My Custom Address Labels!!! I Was Looking For The Best Price For What I Needed. Came Across This Website And I Loved The Look I Created And Just Had To Purchase. When I Received Them, They Came In A Thick Strong Envelope. Opened The Envelope And They Were In Another Paper Envelope Sealed With A "Sweet" Heart Shaped Sticker. (Great Presentation, I Appreciate The Effort You Take To Make It Special) I An A Very Happy Customer! Thank You So Much! Cant Wait To Reorder With This Website!
